Read data set
```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(pxmake)
library(tidyverse)
```

Open dataset 
```{r}
df <- 
  read_rds("micro.rds") %>% 
  select(taar, civst, civdto, kirke)

df
```

Create a metadata template with metamake.

```{r}
metamake(df, "micro.xlsx")
```

Open the template in Excel and fill in the metadata.
